Jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
Jobs.skills:
1. 4+ years of experience C++ and COM API programming
  2. Strong knowledge of design patterns and software architecture concepts
  3. Experience of software development on any leading CAD using COM API framework
  4. Good communication and documentation skills
Jobs.jobDescription:
1. As a Senior Software Engineer you will help the team in accelerating the product development and will take complete ownership of the task assigned
  2. You will be creating the software design specification document, code review document and software traceability matrix
  3. You will be working with the team developing the high-level architecture for the project and communicate the solutions to the customer
  4. You will provide the build to the QA on completion of each sprint and work closely with the QA team to address scope deviations or issues identified
  5. You will be trained on the client specific SDLC process and will ensure the same is followed in your job activities
  6. You should be a fast learner to get an overview of the client domain and functional requirements. You will then assist junior resources in understanding of the same
Jobs.additionalQualificationDesired: Good knowledge of 2D and 3D Geometry concepts

Jobs.title: Software Engineer
Jobs.skills:
• 2+ years of development experience with C#/C++ and COM technologies
  • Good geometry and mathematical skills
  • Good written and oral communication skills
Jobs.jobDescription:
1. Responsible for developing high-quality desktop applications which address engineering design (CAD) problems
  2. Write well-designed and testable code
  3. Troubleshoot, debug and fix issues
  4. Develop flowcharts, layouts and documentation to identify requirements and solutions
Jobs.additionalQualificationDesired: Prior Experience working on CAD API programming and knowledge on computational geometry
Jobs.selectionProcess:
• Written test on C /COM)
  • Geometry/Aptitude test
  • Technical interview
  • HR interview
